treeclimbR 0.1.1
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

aggDS()

aggregate data aggDS aggregate data based on the tree.

buildTree()

build a tree from clusters treeBuild creates a tree (phylo class)

calcMediansByTreeMarker()

Calculate medians (by nodes (clusters) of a tree and marker)

calcTreeCounts()

calculates number of cells per cluster-sample combination.

calcTreeMedians()

Calculate cluster medians on the tree structure calcTreeMedians calculates cluster medians (median expression for each cluster-sample-marker combination). This is a tree version of calcMedians. The clusters used in calcMedians are clusters on the leaf level of the tree here. More details about the data could be found in calcMedians.

edgerWrp()

A wrapper function of edgeR

evalCand()

evaluate candidate levels and select the best one

fdr()

Calculate false discovery rate (FDR) on a tree structure

findChild()

Find the children

findExcl()

find branches that are exclusive from the specified branches

getCand()

search candidates under different thresholds

getLevel()

search for a target level on the tree via a specified score

infoCand()

Get information of candidates

isConnect()

test whether nodes are connected

medianByClusterMarker()

calculate median values of markers for each cluster

nodeResult()

Table of the top differentially abundant entities

parEstimate()

Parameter estimation in Dirichlet-multinomial distribution

runDA()

Test for differential abundance using edgeR

runDS()

Test for differential state using edgeR

selNode()

Select branches

simData()

Simulate different scenarios of abundance change in entities

simMult()

Simulate count tables of entities (multinomial distribution)

throat_v35

a subset data from HMP16SData A dataset containing 16sRNA counts on body subsite: Throat

topNodes()

Table of the top entities (nodes)

tpr()

Calculate true positive rate (TPR) on a tree structure

treeScore()

Generate weighted score accounting for the family effect
